string.name: name
string.value: Building a Time Machine 1: Deep Sea Janitor
#b#p9250126##k is looking for Mainboards, which are needed to build the Time Machine.

Use the OS4 Shuttle located in the OSSS Secret Base 
to travel to the #b#m502010200##k.

You must destroy the Space Ship parts located throughout the deep sea

and bring back 10 Mainboards #b#i04032708:##k.
You retrieved the Mainboards required for the Time Machine.
Mainboards are vital for building time machines. Get some for us. You should be able to find them around the spaceship crash sites in the Deep Sea.
Use the OS4 Shuttle in the Hangar to get there. Now, when you arrive at the Deep Sea, you'll be wearing the OS3D Diving Suit.
Since the water there is so polluted, you cannot take off the suit! \r\nIt's equipped with weapons, so if aliens show up, fight them!
Hurry up before the Mainboards rust...
The Mainboards are in decent condition. Good. Excellent. Whew.
But perhaps you should wash that suit. It reeks!
I told you! Ten Mainboards! Ten!
